long_description: Planning a cruise or anniversary getaway at a tropical resort? Pack the Lole Azur tankini top. Elegant lines and good support for the full-figured bust let you look and feel your best around the pool. D-size support with removable soft cups; straps can cross in back or go straight over the shoulders. High-quality, 4-way-stretch nylon/elastane tricot fabric is designed to hug and flatter the body. Highly resistant to chlorine; dries quickly; offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Pair the Lole Azur tankini top with the bottoms of your choice.
short_description: Planning a cruise or anniversary getaway at a tropical resort? Pack the Lole Azur tankini top. Elegant lines and good support for the full-figured bust let you look and feel your best around the pool.
